summary: Hyperscalers (Meta, Google, Microsoft, AWS) are aggressively increasing AI capex in 2024/2025, with Meta raising guidance to $35-40B, Google planning $50B in capex, and Microsoft increasing cloud spend by 50% YoY. GPU rental prices remain near all-time highs ($3.17/hr) despite minor fluctuations, indicating sustained demand. New model releases (Gemini 2.5, GPT-5 in development, Claude 3, Llama 3) further fuel market momentum.
